base_description: Rectangular black remote with multiple buttons.
part_description: Features numerous oval buttons arranged in rows, a small screen, and a battery compartment at the back.
internal_interaction_description: Buttons are connected to an internal circuit board that sends signals when pressed. The battery compartment provides power, enabling the transmission of infrared signals through an emitter.
external_interaction_description: Used to control electronic devices remotely, such as TVs or audio systems, by sending infrared signals when buttons are pressed.
